thread_id.description: The ID of the [thread](/docs/api-reference/threads) to which this run belongs.

run_id.description: The ID of the run that requires the tool output submission.

tool_outputs.description: A list of tools for which the outputs are being submitted.

tool_call_id.description: The ID of the tool call in the `required_action` object within the run object the output is being submitted for.

output.description: The output of the tool call to be submitted to continue the run.

stream.description: If `true`, returns a stream of events that happen during the Run as server-sent events, terminating when the Run enters a terminal state with a `data: [DONE]` message.
